          <title>
            <string language="en">The electromagnetic spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das elektromagnetische Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le spectre électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O spectrum eletromagnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spettro elettromagnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ηλεκτρομαγνητικό φάσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El espectro electromágnetico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the whole electromagnetic spectrum in the order of increasing frequency and increasing wavelength.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">X-rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das elektromagnetische 
Spektrum des Ganzen in der Ordnung der zunehmenden Frequenz und der 
zunehmenden Wellenlänge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre le spectre électromagnétique
de totalité dans la commande de la fréquence croissante et de la 
longueur d'onde croissante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra o spectrum eletromagnético do
todo na ordem da freqüência crescente e do wavelength crescente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra lo spettro elettromagnetico 
di tutto per frequenza aumentante e la lunghezza d'onda aumentante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει ολόκληρο ηλεκτρομαγνητικό 
φάσμα της τάξεως της αυξανόμενης συχνότητας και του αυξανόμενου 
μήκους κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra el espectro electromágnetico
del conjunto en la orden de la frecuencia de aumento y de la longitud 
de onda de aumento.</string>
          </description>
